meanings.definition: The quality or state of being colorful.
meanings.sent1: The colorfulness of the flowers in the garden brought joy to everyone.
meanings.sent2: I love the colorfulness of the rainbow after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The artist exaggerated the colorfulness of the sunset in his painting, making it look like a magical land.
meanings.sent4: Her personality had a vibrant colorfulness that brightened up any room she entered.
meanings.sent5: The colorfulness of the festival decorations made the whole town come alive.

meanings.definition: The use of bright colors or a variety of colors.
meanings.sent1: The colorfulness of the painting made it stand out among the rest in the gallery.
meanings.sent2: She always admired the colorfulness of the traditional costumes during the cultural parade.
meanings.sent3: The colorfulness of the birthday cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The colorfulness of the garden was like a symphony of hues dancing in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The colorfulness of the fireworks lit up the night sky with bursts of red, green, and blue.
